data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Podkarpackie, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Podkarpackie, Poland
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Podkarpackie, Poland.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 322 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Podkarpackie, Poland to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Podkarpackie, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Karaite people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Karaite people know you.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Podkarpackie, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Podkarpackie, Poland humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,522 believers in Podkarpackie to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
